items.title: Data synchronization
items.text: GridScore is now able to synchronize data collected on different devices for the same trial. Data will be joined by prioritizing data with a newer recording date.

items.title: Germinate export
items.text: When exporting data containing multi-traits to Germinate Data Templates, an aggregation method has to be chosen per trait.

items.title: Surveys
items.text: GridScore now supports another type of dataset, namely Surveys. These are designed to support free data collection which is not physically located in a grid-like fashion.

items.title: Dataset comments
items.text: It's now possible to add general comments to the whole trial. Use the wee comment icon next to the trial name on the data screen.

items.title: Data circles
items.text: Trait data circles for multi-traits now show a half-filled circle when the trait has been scored at least once.

items.title: Speech synthesis
items.text: Fixed a bug with the speech synthesis which would sometimes cause text to be skipped.
